::: {.callout-important}
# Latest News
**[Only virtual attendance is now possible](registration.qmd)!** See the **[FAQ page](faq.qmd)** for frequently asked questions.

[Early and Regular registration](registration.qmd) are now closed. [Keynote speakers and invited sessions](invited-speakers-sessions.qmd) are now available, as is the information on [pre-conference courses](courses.qmd), [mini symposia](mini-symposia.qmd), the [social program](social.qmd) and [accommodation](accommodation.qmd).
Notifications for abstracts have been sent, and notifications for the StCA and CASP application will be sent on April 11<sup>th</sup>, see the [key dates](key-dates.qmd) page for more information.
